name: Jiu Jitsushi
description:
Title: Jiu Jitsushi 

Platform: PC 

Game Genre: Simulation/Puzzle

Rating: E 

Target Market: Young, Casual Gamers (10+)

Game Overview: Player as a fisherman working to collect the rarest fish at the depths of the ocean. Catch fish to make money and upgrade your tools to travel further into the depths.

 Instructions: Use the 'A' and 'D' to move your boat and harpoon left and right. Press 'Space' to launch the harpoon or reel it back in. Your objective is to catch the golden fish at the bottom of the ocean.

Game Design Team 

Josh - Game Designer

Jeremiah - Game Designer

Thomas - Game Designer

Sage - Game Designer
